column5: This estate Is 20 min From DFW Airport. It is in a gated and wooded community close to lakes and hiking, restaurants and shopping. Home is full of warmth, books, abstract paintings and ecclectic furniture. Neighborhood is private and great for adults and kids. Fenced in yard, secure. Bedrooms are private and cozy, with new mattresses. Lots of Parking, couches for your friends and a large pool
column8: Country Estate near airport, speedway and stadium!
